pull.title: Bugfix: Qt/Options: Restore persistent "restart required" notice
pull.body: This got broken when updateProxyValidationState was added.

events.message: Bugfix: Qt/Options: Restore persistent "restart required" notice

events.body: updateProxyValidationState clears it, so the persistent message is never shown in practice
That seems pretty serious, tagging for 0.14

Thanks @luke-jr!
Tested ACK 0b4f273e9cf7166dbd103e116b5d991e359e673d. Indeed, this is an important fix for 0.14.
